summary.Title: Dishwasher for canteens in Copenhagen
summary.Presentation:
Dishwasher for canteens in Copenhagen
 
Europa Kantiner are currently looking for skilled dishwashers for canteens in Copenhagen.
The right colleague for this position is loyal

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Dishwasher for canteens in Copenhagen

 

Europa Kantiner are currently looking for skilled dishwashers for canteens in Copenhagen.

The right colleague for this position is loyal, hardworking and should always contribute to the good working environment in the kitchen. We always strive to give our guests the best experience and this should be a motivation for you aswell.

We expect that you are:  

  • an experienced dishwasher
  • a teamplayer and always flexible and solution-oriented
  • eager to always make good results and keep a clean and organized dishwash

You will be a part of a big organization which means that you will have the opportunity to develop both your personal and professional skills. The working hours are attractive sine the opening hours are during the daytime and in the weekdays.

We consider it important to create a working environment where it is challenging and always fun to work. It is our responsibility to create that environment – we expect of you to have the right attitude and willingness to be a part of our team.

If this sounds interesting to you, please send us a resumé to jobs@europa1989.dk. marked ”Dishwasher Europa Canteens”.
